app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Vizmato Video Editor Maker
app_description: Create awesome videos and slideshows with this easy to use video editing app. Add filters themes music effects and text to make awesome movies. Create videos on this easy to use video editor and share it with your friends on Facebook Instagram YouTube Whatsapp and other social media channels! Download the free slideshow maker and video editing app on your iPhone or iPad now! Edit videos like a professional with Vizmato! Some of the Vizmato s features A Simple yet Powerful Video Editor Choose from 20 video themes and from 40 awesome visual effects to add a Hollywood edge to your video Clip trim and edit videos with ease to create the perfect movie in our easy to use video editor Choose your background music from 140 Free Viztunes or add background music of your choice while editing Vizmato s editor with a voice changer effects let s you modulate your voice to sound like a Baby chipmunk ghost and more! Tell a video story and record a voiceover on your video Editor with speed control Add a slow up or speed up effects on your video. You can also choose to reverse the video Add customised text and stickers to your movie with our text editor Amazing Slideshow Maker Convert your photos into amazing videos! Just add your photos or videos select a theme and add music to create an amazing video slideshow in seconds Choose from our collection of curated and royalty free music or select your own music for your photo slideshow Customise your photos videos and text in this easy to use slideshow maker app HD Video Recorder with Live FX Vizmato is your own PRO HD Video Recorder! Use it to record a video in HD with filters themes and instant video effects applied while you record! Play music while recording to get your lip sync just right Watch cool user created videos! Watch movies made by a community of Vizmato video makers. Be an aspiring moviemaker and share your creation on the Vizmato platform Share it with the world A simple one tap export in HD and sharing of your videos on Facebook Instagram YouTube Twitter Whatsapp Vine Snapchat or any social network of your choice. Here s what the reviewers have to say! Vizmato is basically a dream combination of Snapchat and Instagram. Teen Vogue Like Instagram but with a focus on smartphone videos. Macworld This app makes editing videos fun and easy. Geektime Think Instagram filters and sharing but solely for videos. MacNN Vizmato PRO Subscriptions Remove the Watermark from all your future videos Access PRO Visual Effects and Themes Access Slideshow PRO features 140 royalty free Viztunes Vizmato PRO subscription terms: A charge of 11.99 for a yearly subscription will be made to your iTunes account at the end of the 7 day Free Trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period Any unused portion of the Trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription You can manage subscriptions including turning off auto renewal by accessing the user s account settings Terms of use: http: www.vizmato.com pages terms conditions.html Privacy Policy: http: vizmato.com pages privacy.html Follow us on Twitter https: twitter.com Vizmato Facebook https: www.facebook.com vizmato Instagram https: www.instagram.com vizmato YouTube https: www.youtube.com c vizmato Rate the Vizmato app on the App Store talk to us and share your feedback at vizmato globaldelight.com
